grobnercrystals documentation
=============================

**grobnercrystals** is a `SageMath <https://doc.sagemath.org/html/en/index.html>`__ package for working with *Gr√∂bner crystal structures* (introduced in `this preprint <https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.07560>`__).

Check out the :doc:`usage` section for further information.

.. note::

   This project is under active development.

--------
